original_text: These were Esau's descendants who became leaders of their clans: The sons of Esau's firstborn son, Eliphaz were Teman, Omar, Zepho, Kenaz,
korean_text: 에서 자손 중 족장은 이러하니라 에서의 장자 엘리바스의 자손으로는 데만 족장, 오말 족장, 스보 족장, 그나스 족장과

sentences.original_text: who became leaders of their clans
The sons of Esau's firstborn son
Eliphaz were Teman, Omar, Zepho, Kenaz
